articles.title: German minister pursues hydrogen in Namibia, South Africa after Russian gas cut-off - News24
articles.description: German Economy Minister Robert Habeck began a five-day trip to Namibia and South Africa Sunday, part of a push to secure new energy resources for Europe’s biggest economy to compensate for the cut-off from Russian gas supplies.
